import React, { useState } from 'react' const AddReview = () => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [reviewText, setReviewText] = useState('') const [rating, setRating] = useState("Rating") const handleSubmitReview =(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() } return (
setName(e.target.value)} id='name' placeholder='name' type='text' className='form-control' />
) } export default AddReview
